manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: The Lightweight Upright BGU8000 Bissell 13” Lightweight upright vacuum commercial grade construction with powerful suction, great for cleaning carpeting and bare floors. Large capacity disposable filter bag and virtually indestructible fan backed up with lifetime warranty.

Specifications -Lightweight Commercial Upright. -Powerful, high-speed (6,500 RPM), balanced, roller brushes. -40 ft. Power cord is connected to the pigtail cord using a cord clamp, allowing you to easily replace a damaged cord without expensive repairs or re-wiring. -Top-fill design keeps power at maximum even while bag fills. Largest bag in the industry. -Self adjusting brush roller, goes from carpet to bare floors with no adjustments. -Virtually indestructible reinforced fan has a lifetime warranty. -Non-marring bumpers. -13” wide cleaning head. -Cord guard prevents cord damage. -Soft wheels protect wood floors. -The large rear wheels make moving from room to room an ease. - Fingertip-controlled on/off switch. - Easy-use carry handle allows for simple, sturdy carrying -Limited Two-Year commercial warranty.

Features 13" Cleaning Path Width Self adjusting brush Roller. Ergonomic Handle Finger tip on / off switch. Easy-Use Carry Handle Allows for easy moving from room to room. 40' Power Cord 40 ft. Power cord is connected to the pigtail cord using a cord clamp, allowing you to easily replace a damaged cord without expensive repairs or re-wiring.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 7, 2018
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars shipped safely and quickly
reviews.reviewText: this has worked very well for our thrift store, excellent quality, very lightweight and easy to use

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 19, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Got this vacuum and was thrilled by its light weight and suction power, BUT then the problems started shortly after 4 or 5 uses. The power cord is so junky that the wires that run through it started fraying underneath. It was shorting as I used it. For a while as long as long as I held the cord and pinched it, it worked. But then it wouldn't even turn on. As you can in the photo, the zipper is of such poor quality that it started getting stuck and then like all cheap zippers it malfunctioned and its impossible to fix. I feel like I was robbed without a gun and I have no recourse but to throw this piece of junk away.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Hasta ahora tiene buena performance
reviews.reviewText: Si está bien , muy fácil de usar

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 11, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I recommend this vacuum
reviews.reviewText: Great vacuum! I own my own housekeeping service for 35 years now and I’ve gone through vacuums. I will have to say this is one of the best top ten. The only thing I didn’t like was the pig tail connection it was very bulky and it ended up wearing out and causing a short in the cord so I had that removed which made a world of difference. It does go through belts and I was surprise that the handle literally disintegrated. It also has great suction. I recommend this vacuum. Unfortunately you can’t buy anything that lasts so you have to expect that when you purchase anything new today that you’re going to have to repair it frequently. It’s very unfortunate but true of our times.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 25, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars ZIPPER ON BAG
reviews.reviewText: How do i get a new BAG THE ZIPPERIS BROKE cjm18@comcast.net

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 18, 2022
reviews.reviewText: I live in an Apartment and this product works the best on my carpet.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 31, 2018
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Don’t Bother — Really. Pictures as Proof
reviews.reviewText: I bought two and first it was just one that broke right away... so I just thought it was defective and I returned/ replaced it and bought another one (3 total). Within ONE WEEK (not even exaggerating) all 3 were broken. It didn’t just break, but they split in half! I didn’t bother getting a replacement again because I realized it was just a poor product and I didn’t want a new one to add to my vacuum cemetery. I own a school and it was just used to vacuum the classrooms nightly—nothing crazy just one vacuum per room. I just can’t believe how terrible they are. Note- they aren’t not commercial grade and if you are doing any kind of vacuuming other than your bedroom - let’s say once a week then just run. Seriously. I doubt they will give me a refund now but I figured I had to let others knows about this mess!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 6, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars Was happy, now just disappointed
reviews.reviewText: Loved this vacuum, it picks up great, lightweight, easy to use UNTIL just when its too late to return the cord has a short in it!! So very disappointed!!! Really had thought we had the perfect vaccum cleaner for out buisness and now we have a short in the cord and its only been a month! Not sure what to do now!
